body:
Hi Francesco Anselmo ,


thank you for being very generous towards the so called sluggish window$
users. i badly needed to use the radmap under windows environment for my
college project and thanks to you for providing us with necessary radiance
programs .


I have installed Ubuntu 7.10 in an attempt to make a transition for windows
to the linux (open source). i will join the open source club shortly. i am
still a toddler in using both radiance and linux based OS.


thank you,


Aditya Potipireddi
MS Building Design ( Energy & Climate)
Arizona State University
tel. 480.544.4936






On Thu, Feb 28, 2008 at 5:28 PM, Francesco Anselmo <pisuke at blueyonder.co.uk>
___
